No ads, good for making audio and video library, neat app. thanks

description:
This app is great! You can download the video/audio of all video's on Youtube. The search function give a list when writing words and it is very accurate. 

Saving videos for later is ideal. You can view them on the road, without the need for internet.

This seems like it should do something, but when I installed it it literally does nothing at all. It doesn't play anything (which why would you need? Just go to YouTube). There is no way to download anything, no instructions, and nothing works. Just another useless waste of time.
summary: Does Nothing, Shows Nothing, No Instructions on How to Use Anywhere

description: Please get a UI designer involved in this project as the interface looks 14 years old!

description:
Nice application
- Search with suggestions
- Download video in any quality

Thank you so much
good we can easily download videos which is locked by youtube to download from others sites and software.

superrb, it's a good software.Amazing backgroud.
the idea of the developer is really amazing.
installation process is lengthy but once it completed you can do anything.
there are some additional features added in this software.
use it.
and share your own experience,my experience with this software is really good.

Also, the question about where are downloads is now less important. You can go to settings and find the downloaded videos and downloaded tracks cards , then look for the folder icon.

This tool is sweet. The primary downside to the app is I suppose that your favorite channels will not get credit each time you watch the video. I don't really know how things work, but just a guess. If you want to give people credit use the YouTube in a browser.

description: Have used a few of these before but this is a very simple application that reliably does what it says

Straight after downloading it looks really Pretty, has a list of a bunch of Yo MTV gangsta artists in the Search Window, but if you type anything into the Search Box it does NOTHING. It just sits there. If you try to right click and PASTE a URL into the Search Box, it will not allow you to Right Click and Paste ANYTHING! So the Program is Basically USELESS!! I Recommend Ultimate Media Downloader2 Instead, at least THAT program FUNCTIONS!
simplicity needed
no ads, easy to use, good support for download audio and convert to audio, good to replace youtube on browser with lower ram usage
Althought it says its free the download is an evaluation copt any requires a subscription. Not sure if it even works on ubuntu 20.04 didnt return results on a search.
so far so good..

It does what it's supposed, but the prerequisities of first launch can be confusing. 

The quality settings before playing a video could be set to some reasonable default and indeed the option to change audio and video quality only upon demand.
"15 day evaluation period" shareware bs. please change the license type to be accurate, instead of trying to sucker people.

description: Did not work on manjaro - segmentation fault
I see this app and can only imagine how much work you put into it.
Can't search anything, can't play anythinh

This app is not at all intuitive and can be very frustrating to use. It sorta works mostly for downloading mustic, but getting videos is a nightmare. There's no obvious way to specity the format the files are saved in, or save them to a useful location like "Downloads" or "Music" or "Videos". Instead the files always end up deeply burried in an obscure folder hiracy and are often usually not in a useful file format that can easly be opened and played with a different media player.

Above all it seens a more intuitive interface. Half the time I have no idea what I should be clicking on to do anything.

This app worked right out of the box. Had to tinker with it a little to see what it can do. I downloaded it to download videos and it did just that. Now i can watch youtube videos offline.

So far Utube has been behaving itself and does what firefox & download helper did and more. 5 stars...

description: Much better than using browser, perfect app for watching or downloading from youtube.

This app is really good but there are super 
inefficient issues that should be addressed if its 
going to be a PAID Service. 1. When you download 
something it doesnt give you the option to choose a 
down load folder, now I have to manually move the files 
from where its at to any other location when every 
other application in the world lets you choose a 
download folder. 2. When it downloads at least the audio
form it downloads the files with totally random names
 and now I cant tell what file is what and have to listen 
to it to figure out how to name it. 3. When you search 
for something it only provides like 20 results eachtime
when I know there should be a lot more. 4. On the interface
I cannot select more than one video at a time, I mean
I can stop all, or pause all...but if I have like 40 things 
downloading and 20 are done, I just want to check box
 the ones that are done and click clear all, but no I have 
to right click on each one to clear it off the que. Like this
 app is really cool but these issues are super dumb and 
make it not worth using. I download A LOT of things like
 music etc. So when I do this I need good control over 
many downloads but currently this app in trial version 
is way to in efficient.
While I haven't yet figured out how to remove batches of downloadable songs at once, it is a great app
there is an evaluation period, which disables any useful features if you don't pay money.
